comments: Gordon (DEN) establishes himself in Washington's (DAL) path and his legs remain within the frame of his body as contact occurs, which he does not deliver.
Washington (DAL) and Jokic (DEN) engage and disengage with one another and marginal contact occurs as the pick is set.
Porter Jr. (DEN) extends his leg out and makes intentional foot to ball contact.
Murray (DEN) is drawn in the air by the pump fake and makes contact with Donic (DAL) which affects his shot attempt near the rim.
Caldwell-Pope (DEN) establishes himself in Washington's (DAL) path and does not deliver illegal contact.
Doncic (DAL) establishes his position and absorbs the contact initiated by Jokic (DEN) during his shot attempt in the post.
Porter Jr. (DEN) and Kleber's (DAL) engage in incidental contact with one another while in pursuit of the loose ball.
Washington (DAL) is moving alongside Murray's (DEN) path and marginal body contact occurs during Murray's drive.
Hardaway Jr. (DAL) maintains his arms within the frame of his body and does not deliver illegal contact to Gordon (DEN) during the screen.
After communicating with the Replay Center, it is confirmed that Irving (DAL) releases his shot attempt before the expiration of the game clock and the basket is successful.
